/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a dynamic element to the scene. Cars and buses are scattered throughout the street, indicating a busy time of day. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, with shadows subtly changing as the sun moves across the sky.
